name: unsurpassable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
better than anything that could be achieved by someone or something else : This is an amazing part of the world, unique in its isolation, unsurpassable in its beauty. He described the medical care he had received at the hospital as "unsurpassable". Synonym
unsurpassed
More examplesFewer examplesThe company's success is founded on a simple philosophy: to offer a range of top-quality products at the most competitive prices, together with unsurpassable customer service.He thought the amount that he was paid was fair, considering his unsurpassable footballing skills.Raphael was known as the "divine Raphael", the unsurpassable genius of painting, and the high point of the Italian Renaissance.
